'''Combat''' in ''[[Genshin Impact]]'' is a Game System where the player performs battle with [[enemies]] when [[Exploration|exploring]] the open world of [[Teyvat]].

==Characters==
[[File:Icon Character.png|thumb|right|[[Traveler]]]]
{{Main|Characters}}
* '''[[Talents]]''' - Skills and Abilities that [[characters]] have.
* '''[[Constellations]]''' - Extra Progression to characters that increase the effectiveness or give new functions to existing Talents.
* '''[[Fallen Characters]]''' - When characters are dead.
* '''[[Energy]]''' - A resource used to character [[Elemental Burst]]s.
* '''[[Talent Level Increase]]''' - Increases the level of Talents.

==Attributes==
[[File:Icon Attribute Health.png|thumb|right|[[HP]]]]
[[File:Icon Attribute Attack.png|thumb|right|[[ATK]]]]
[[File:Icon Attribute Defense.png|thumb|right|[[DEF]]]]

==Elements==
[[File:Elemental Resonance.png|200px|thumb|right|[[Elemental Resonance]]]]
{{Main|Elements}}
* '''[[Elements]]''' - The damage and resistance types, including:{{Column|2|
** {{Anemo}}
** {{Cryo}}
** {{Dendro}}
** {{Electro}}
** {{Geo}}
** {{Hydro}}
** {{Pyro}}
** {{Physical}}
}}
* '''[[Elemental Reactions]]''' - Combination of Elements providing special effects on a target.
* '''[[Elemental Resonance]]''' - Combination of characters in a [[Party]] to provide special effects.
* '''[[Elemental Absorption]]''' - The ability of {{Anemo}} skills to absorb an Element.
* '''[[Elemental Infusion]]''' - When [[Normal Attacks]] are converted from Physical to Elemental Damage.
{{clr}}

==Mechanics==
[[File:Bubble.png|200px|thumb|right|[[Bubbles]]]]
* '''[[Area of Effect]]''' - Effects from character Talents or enemy attacks that deal damage that affects more than a single target.
* '''[[Auras]]''' - Effects displayed as a circle around enemies that provide special effects.
* '''[[Bubbles]]''' - Obstacles that characters and enemies can create to trap their opponents.
* '''[[Charge]]''' - The ability for a [[Talent]] to be used in quick succession without facing [[cooldown]].
* '''[[Charge Levels]]''' - Different effects based on how long an ability is held.
* '''[[Displacement]]''' - The action of moving or disabling something.
* '''[[Duration]]''' - How long Talents or effects last.
* '''[[Elemental Nodes]]''' - Structures in the world that provide enemies with elemental buffs.
* '''[[Fury]]''' - Status that gives additional behavior or stage change.
* '''[[Elemental Gauge Theory]]''' - Explanation of [[Elemental Reaction]] effectiveness.
* '''[[Hitlag]]''' - Delay used to give impact to actions.
* '''[[Invincibility Frames]]''' - Ability to be invulnerable to damage to a period of time.
* '''[[Ley Line Disorders]]''' - Special conditions in [[Domains]].
* '''[[Shields]]''' - Barriers uses to protect the wielder.
* '''[[Snapshotting]]''' - Ability to save the attributes of an ability after the conditions are lost.
* '''[[Status]]''' - Buffs and Debuffs that modify [[Attributes]] or [[Elements]].
* '''[[Vacuum Field]]''' - The act of sucking objects and opponents.
* '''[[Weight]]''' - How heavy a character or enemy is and how different abilities can affect them.
